data: {"concept_id": "prepositional_phrase", "concept_name": "Prepositional Phrase", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "Preposition + object bundle that carries relationship meaning; modifier module for clarity and rhythm.", "axes": "function|placement|density|specificity|register", "axis_values": "adjectival|adverbial | lead|mid|tail | lean|medium|thick | generic|concrete | plain|elevated", "source_file": "Prepositional Phrases.md", "source_md5": "05df1a1e14a47370529c1a4a22d4aef2", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "prepositional_phrase", "error_id": "of_chain_flab", "description": "Long of-of chains reduce clarity/energy.", "fixit": "Use possessives or precise nouns; collapse chains.", "example_fix": "‘performance of the team’→‘the team’s performance’.", "source_file": "Prepositional Phrases.md", "source_md5": "05df1a1e14a47370529c1a4a22d4aef2", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "prepositional_phrase", "error_id": "phrasal_verb_confusion", "description": "Confusing particles with prepositions.", "fixit": "Test: does the particle travel with the verb?", "example_fix": "‘look up the word’ vs ‘look up at the sign’.", "source_file": "Prepositional Phrases.md", "source_md5": "05df1a1e14a47370529c1a4a22d4aef2", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "prepositional_phrase", "error_id": "into_vs_in_to", "description": "Motion ‘into’ vs the two-word sequence ‘in to’.", "fixit": "Spell ‘into’ for motion; separate when ‘to’ starts an infinitive.", "example_fix": "‘run into the store’ vs ‘log in to check’", "source_file": "Prepositional Phrases.md", "source_md5": "05df1a1e14a47370529c1a4a22d4aef2", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_pp_lock_joins", "concept_id": "prepositional_phrase", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Add PPs to lock scene joints (place/time/means/association) in a blurry paragraph.", "expected_features": "People stop teleporting; time/place clear.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "function|placement|density|specificity|register", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Prepositional Phrases.md", "source_md5": "05df1a1e14a47370529c1a4a22d4aef2", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}
